tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi,

We started consulting the Dr. Triveni for pregnancy related topics from June 2016 and in Aug 2016 my wife Shubha and got conceived. It was confirmed that we will be having twin babies and finally blessed with 2 cute boys on March 06, 2017.

Care taken by the doctor during critical situations of pregnancy.

1. During 02nd month she had severe bleeding and admitted to the hospital. The doctor came immediately and checked the babies and my wife and managed so that the bleeding got stopped and all were fine.
2. During 03rd month had cervical stitches which was early detected by the doctor during regular check ups. The time and the way doctor took the decision is really appreciable because with the twin babies it would have been very difficult and due to this miscarriage was prevented.
3. Almost at the end of 06th month, had severe early contraction pains at midnight and got admitted to the hospital again. Doctor managed and took utmost care so that the delivery is postponed.

Along with these critical conditions , she had diabetics & hypertension which was also taken care completely.
 
Finally my wife completed 8 months (36 weeks) and got delivered twin boys.

All the family members are really happy and very much convinced with the doctors treatment / care / managing during critical conditions and the way of responding.

For those who are planning to consult this doctor, we strongly recommend to have the consultations. She will be taking care of the patients with care and patience.

Thank you very much Dr Triveni for all your care, support during my wife's pregnancy and giving us the 2 cute little boys :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Read it completely::::

Hi Everyone,

This might take little longer time to read, however its worth if you want a real information about the experience we had.

We started visiting her last October 2018, we tried all other options for pregnancy. My wife was Having PCOD, it was difficult for us. We got to know about PCOD when we met Dr. Triveni. Initially we were hesitant to start the process explained by her. However, we wanted to be positive and had a long conversation with her about this. 

She ensured everything will be fine. We started the process in the month of Oct and in the month of December my wife conceived. There after we went on regular check ups without any misses and followed all the prescription given by her.  From day 1 she has taken good care of my wife and during every check up she has provided ample information about the baby's growth and condition( All scans including blood,Sugar, Urine and Anomaly). Every single issues related to baby was handled with ease by her. Finally we went to our native after 7 months of check up and during that phase also she gave us information what all are needed and what need to be done in 8th and 9th month. Finally on 30th July we had a baby boy born( Normal Delivery- CMC Vellore). 

Finally I want to say about Dr. Triveni is that she is one of the best doctors we have seen in recent times. She carries more than 13 years in this Industry and she is humble all the time you visit. She asks every single questions and remembers each and every conversation with every patient who is visiting her regularly. Though the tablets and few Injection might seems little expensive but for problems we had it was the best. Don't be hesitant in meeting her. She knows what she is prescribing . Have a faith on her.

I will highly recommend her to everyone who is reading this and I have already recommended it to few of my friends.

Keep up the good work Dr. Triveni. Thank you for taking care of my Wife. We really are grateful for everything you have done.

Regards,
Sushmitha & Naveen

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Labor and Delivery,Hysteroscopy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: I can say Dr. Triveni is an Angel for us...It's been almost  more than a year I am connected with Triveni ma'am, since the time I am trying for a baby. The day I met Triveni ma'am all my problems started getting resolved gradually and with great care, patience and proper guidance of ma'am, I could conceive and finally delivered a healthy term baby girl on 3rd April. Dr. Triveni is very humble and patient friendly. Before advicing anything she always tries to understand the problem and also the past history of the patient, thus the treatment is always on spot and works very well. I still remember the day morning I took my pregnancy test at home and informed her over WhatsApp and for the same day I also booked appointment to visit her at hospital..And in the hospital when I met her she was so happy for me, i could feel that. Throughout my entire pregnancy journey she was always there to guide me even on call and over WhatsApp incase I couldn't make it to hospital and gave the correct advice at right time which helped me to complete the term without any complications. She has taken all the precautionary measures during my pregnancy which has kept both me and my baby healthy till my delivery. Even after my delivery she is taking care of all the aspects of my postpartum journey so that my mental as well as physical health would be in good shape for forever. Most importantly Dr. Triveni is a great human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Infertility,Obstetrics Problems,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: LONG Story. Please READWe planned to have a baby from 2020 and started visiting a few doctors. Honestly there was a lot of negative response and no proper guidance from them. We kept searching for doctors and came across Dr Triveni in the beginning of 2021 in Practo. We started visiting her in her clinic first. My first impression, she is very calm, composed and explains to us every thing in detail. Good part was, she always told us that it may take time (as there were few complications) but we will have a baby. This positivity gave us a lot of assurance plus her lovely behaviour.We visited her always advised and the treatment went on. She explain us in every stage about the problem and what the treatment is about out.I was able to conceive in April, 2022. She guided me through my pregnancy like I am her family member. Always available on phone and messages for me. She has answered my calls during her vacation, during function at her home, while she was traveling. She answered calls at every time and guided me with the medicines or alternate steps.We now have a baby and it is all because of Dr Triveni. She came to our life like God and she will be like one forever for us. We almost lost hope of having a baby but she kept our hopes alive and kept us positive throughout. We don't know how to thank her for what she has done for us but we will be forever grateful to her.Thank You,Sananda and Shubhabrata

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi I am Shefali.I visited Dr Triveni during my pregnancy's first trimester. I had heavy bleeding issue during my second month. I remember how I got worried and reached Dr's clinic. she checked me and adviced me for a complete bed rest followed by the required medicines.Unnecessarily she has never sent me for any tests or scans.even during when lockdown started she was always approachable via phone.she supported me throughout a lot.During my third trimester I got diagnosed with preeclampsia and used to have a very high blood pressure n swelling.Dr adviced me an appropriate strict diet followed by medicines to keep my bp in track. since I was diagnosed with preeclampsia my pregnancy had become a little complicated so chances were there that I had to give birth a little early around 36 weeks.I still remember the day before my child was born, Dr calmed me down and prepared me for the situation ahead n to face it bravely. today my child is three months old.Even today if there is any health issue I take her suggestion. the staff members too at the clinic have been supportive and helpful.Thank you Doctor for your support, treatment, advice , positivity and friendly way in which you have treated meShashank and Shefali üòäüôè

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cervical Cerclage,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Female Infertility Treatment,
review:
We were trying for baby from last 8yrs and got reference to meet Dr .Triveni mam in 2021 and dream came true in Noble Hospital, Dr.Triveni mam is too good and no second thought so that will feel, you are in safe hands. She took very good care and will be answering all the queries politely and always reachable. Mam usually understands the patient quickly and take proactive steps to make sure all goes good. She gave positive hope and we finally delivered a baby boy in Nov 22. Mam took care of us post the delivery as well. Special thanks to all front desk staffs and nurses in Noble Hospital and are very caring and the environment was peaceful with great hygiene.

Thanks & Regards,
Sashi Rekha & Mohan

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Triveni doctor is literally a life saver. I was suffering from pcos and it was difficult for me to get pregnant, but with her treatment and continuous checkup I got pregnant. I also had a miscarriage when I was 5 months pregnant, the reason was cervical incompetence. I waited few more months to get pregnant again, but this time she suggested cervical stitching to save my pregnancy and I  was put on bed rest. And finally blessed with a baby boy. I want to tell everyone who is looking for a good gynaecologist, please come to her. She is always available whenever u face any problem. And u will definitely end up having a baby for sure. I highly recommend this gynaecologist to every woman out there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is Jyothi Shri N suffering from hernia and fibroids, cyst. Triveni doctor did operation very well...my both operation that hernia with mesh repair work done by Sujay B R...another operation hysterectomy by Laparoscopic done by Triveni  doctor...both my operation done very well ..still now no pain or any complaint. I highly recommend Triveni doctor and Sujay BR. Triveni doctor not only telling the what happened but also told me about my old complications about my right ovary and one simple cyst also there....miracle doctor sort it out my all complications...very good Gynaecologist I ever want to suggest everyone...Sujay BR and Triveni doctors  have good patience... heavy patience needed to remove the sticky hernia that stick in to my uterus....it is god boon that day with patience both doctor took 5 hours time to proper the hernia that sticked to my uterus...then did surgery very well ..i am fine nowI am greatful to both Sujay B R and Triveni doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dear Sir/Madam,

My self Priti Satyanaik  , I was in Europe and came to India when I was 6 month pregnant.i consulted nano hospital and gynoc Dr Triveni who I was consulting since 7 months pregnancy
My due date was 18 Jun however I got labour pain on 11 June night 10:15pm and admitted to nano hospital immediately and doctor came at 10:30 pm.
She did pv test and told baby is 3cm and it takes 5-6 hrs to deliver hence she shifted me to private ward instead maternity/trial ward however I got severe labour pain at 11:30pm and doc delayed 10 min to attend me as she was sleeping in other room this has caused issue.baby had 2 loop chords on his neck which caused oxygen problem for 10 min and kept in ventilator for 2 days .my son 3.5 kg healthy son fought for 2 days and expired on 13 June.this is purely doc mistake which she agreed and told us sorry saying it's lesson for her...but for me it's big losss
reply_text: I dont agree that i was sleeping n there was no delay in conducting delivery she had a precipitated delivery& 2cord around the neck that caused the distress . Any Delivery in 2hr is called precipitated delivery.she delivered in 1hr 15min.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ****** * **** **** **** She clearly explains the  and the treatment. She is not  only  treating the problems she is treating the root cause.. patiently she sits and listens first. You will get the confidence when you talk to her for the first time itself as if you know her for years. I had to undergo hysterectomy under her guidance. While she opened only I had one more complications and immediately she attended to. I did the right thing is I believed her. I would definitely recommend her for the treatment.

tags: Wait time,
review: Hi mam, I'm Ajitha.... We went to many hospital and lits of medicine taken for pregnancy treatment because of two miscarriages but not satisfied with treatment and finally my husband's friend recommended Dr. Triveni mam though her clinic was bit far away from my place it takes nearly one hour. . Distance is not a matter... the way of treatment, friendly speaking, explains clearly about our doubts. . I have mild PCOS.. She spoke to us very friendly and explains about the procedure step by steps.. I strongly recommended triveni mam who ever looking for good gynic problems. She responds our call and take care of her patients.. I am hoping for my best.... She can only take care of me...Thank you triveni mam, aruna akka and medical staffs..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * *** ** ***** I had visited dr.Triveni after the loss of my previous pregnancy due to anomalous baby. We consulted her for a prenatal course firstly. During the treatment her friendly behaviour and the way she explains the issues made me so comfortable to plan for the next baby when I had lost the hope of getting healthy baby as l was diabetic and obese.But she made me and my husband strong throughout our pregnancy journey fighting every obstacles. she was our only hope we could rely on and she made it a very successful journey being available at all situations. We are now blessed with a healthy baby girl.Thank you doctor for everything you did to us being close like a friend. I would highly recommend dr.Triveni.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was searching in Practo for a good gynaecologist and I found Dr. Triveni. Her ratings and comments by patients made me to choose her though her clinic was a bit far from my place. When I visited her clinic, there were  already so many waiting and when my turn came I spoke to the Dr and realised that she is so easy to interact and explains why the problem exists and the remedial action required. What I found amazing is that she saw the medications that I was taking and asked me to stop many of them as they were unnecessary and has suggested few natural methods. it was a pleasant experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went to many doctors for pregnancy but not satisfied with treatment and finally we met Dr. Triveni. She spoke to us very friendly and explained about the procedure patiently. Because of her help only I got conceived and throughout my pregnancy she monitered me very well. In the 7th month of pregnancy I got bp and AFI was reduced. We got very tensed but she maintained very well and extended upto 34 weeks only with medicines. During the time of COVID 19 also she responded and monitered me day by day for one and half month and finally we are blessed with baby girl and baby is healthy. She responds to our call at any time nd she takes care of her patients very well. She is real goddess in our life. We will never forget her in our life. She is very kind hearted to poor patients *** ********** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** Trust us you will never regret with her treatment. Thank you Dr. Triveni mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Triveni was great. My mom had to undergo Uterus Removal Surgery, last month. Dr.Triveni helped us by explaining everything and gave the better option to go with. She helped us to get a better package which included room rent, food, fresh juice was provided every 2 hours. Also, great assistance from the nurse and staff.Overall, my mom was very happy as the operation went smooth and without much pain. We definitely recommend Dr. Triveni to all my friends and family members. Thanks a lot for all your help and guidance Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Firstly, I would like to thank PRACTO for their wonderful work.

I got to know about Nano Hospital from Google, I went there for pregnancy confirmation for my wife. There I got to meet Dr Triveni, a wonderful human being, friendly in nature, very down to earth, she has very good listings skills, she gives ample amount of time for your concerns and then she explains things in layman's language. She will make you understand what's happening in every stage of pregnancy and give enough information and advice and clear all our ambiguities by time.

Right from the beginning, we are in touch base with her and I strongly recommend to others for anything related to gynaecology.

She prescribes medicine and scanning and other treatments as and when it's needed. Only if it's needed she will recommend to go for the tests/scanning. And even the consultation fee is also reasonable.

At times, she gives quick response on call or text even she is busy with other consultations. Her response to our urgency is highly appreciable even in her busy schedule. Hats off Dr.

It's amazing to know, we have this kind of good doctors around. 

Thank you so much for all the care and support you have been providing us throughout our journey of pregnancy.

Regards,
Naveen

tags: None
review:
Dear All
On behalf of my wife Priya Myself Sudip
We recommend Dr. Triveni ** *** ** *** ***** *** ***** ****** * *** **** ** i meet plenty of doctor through india & now a day most of them are commercial.
Below are the few thing which diffentiate Dr. Triveni
from others
1.She has a patience to listen to your problem that may increase the waiting time of next patent but it is good for all.
2.She will explain you everythying in common language not in medical terminology.

3.And I believe she has a solution for all pregnancy related issue.
4.Last  but not least she will recommend u the test which is required only & not for commercial purpose.
So we recommend 100% to Dr. Triveni & I belive in future we will see Dr. Triveni * ***** *** **** ************ ** **********

review:
Hotrible Experiance with the doctor. Practo took the appointment at a specific time, we reached by the said time and doctor left the clinic.
We rescheduled the appointment, again on the scheduled date doctor went on leave and appointment got canceled.

I am surprised how a doctor can be so irresponsible!

reply_text: Practo care opds managed by the practo care team this pt expects doctor to wait that to when I was having emergency case and he came late he is not bothered about that and talking about the responsibility of the doctor . I want to tell u that responsibility lies in attending the emergencies not for waiting the pt when you r not on time... Ist learn to give the respect to doctor ...and their time .u come n meet me I will show my responsibilities to the patients .

review: I actually went to have a checkup as I was getting periods twice a month...somehow it sorted after few months now...but when visited for treatment to treat irregular periods in a month..she didn't treated for that instead she started treating for having a baby seeing our interest***** ****** **** ********* ***** *** ********* ** * ***** ***** *** *********** *** *********** ** ******** ** ******** ******************* *** ***** ** ****** *** **** ******** ** i don't believe whatever doctor says..I was literally Upset with the Treatment..
reply_text: I thought of replying for this becoz 3 points to be analysed 1st one she says somehow her periods issue sorted out then why did she visit me simply to give a feedback?   2nd point  if her periods sorted out then it must be minimum 2 to 3months for to say regularised so she should given the feedback at that time not now.. 3rd point is that I HV not seen the pt  came to me for regular sing the period n I counselled for pregnancy we r well educated n according to the pt wish we treat now the readers should analyse this feedback is fake or   real . As for my knowledge I HV not seen this pt in last one week.....and I can't say about...her level of education in this....

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ****** ** **** *** she explains well and sounds caring. But I had the problem with the cost. For a simple medical termination of pregnancy of my wife I had to pay 650 on practo. 5000 for her for 2 scans which is way too much and 800 for the follow up visit which was just after 6 days and 1500 if I visit again for another scan. When asked about such exorbitant prices the hospital staff said it is costly because I booked from practo. 
5000 for TVS is way too costly.

review:
I had lots of problems during my pregnancy and doctor handled all very well.
I had a very high chances of premature delivery in 5th month of pregnancy. To stop premature pregnancy, she choose fluid injection method twice(in 5th month & 7th month) rather than stitching cervix. 
Hats off to her expertise in my case!!
Now i am seeking for a normal delivery within a month. :)
